title: Breaking Bad creator confirms Walter White's fate ahead of El Camino
text:
Walter White’s fate has been revealed (Picture: AMC)

Breaking Bad fans have been kept in the dark for six long years over Walter White’s fate – until now.

In the final episode of the Netflix series the infamous character, played by Bryan Cranston, was gunned down and he was last seen lying on the ground smiling as an officer checked for his pulse.

Whether or not Walter had survived the brutal attack had remained a complete mystery, however, with the spin-off El Camino film around the corner, the show’s creator has finally delivered the verdict.

Speaking on The Rich Eishen Show, Vince Gilligan revealed the news we’ve all been waiting for.

‘Yeah, I’m going to give you that one, Rich, because I love you so much,’ Vince said. ‘Yes, Walter White is dead. Yes.’

In our hearts, we knew this would be the case, but we still held out hope.

Advertisement

Advertisement

That doesn’t completely rule out a cameo appearance from Walter in the forthcoming movie El Camino though, as it’s already been confirmed that deceased character Mike Ehrmantraut will be returning.

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

On top of that, it’s been announced that 10 fan-favourites will feature. So you know, there’s a very strong possibility.

El Camino picks up after the season five finale, where Jesse Pinkman (Aaron Paul) escaped his white supremacist captors in a Chevrolet El Camino and drove to freedom.

‘In the wake of his dramatic escape from captivity, Jesse must come to terms with his past in order to forge some kind of future,’ teases the official synopsis.

Jesse will be joined by the likes of Skinny Pete (Charles Baker), and Brandon ‘Badger’ Mayhew (Matt Jones), with possible appearances from Skyler White (Anna Gunn), Marie Schrader (Betsy Brandt), and Saul Goodman (Bob Odenkirk).

Advertisement

Advertisement

El Camino: A Breaking Bad Movie releases 11 October on Netflix.

description: Breaking Bad creator finally confirms Walter White's fate ahead of El Camino release.
